techmeme.title: Twilio says threat actors identified the phone numbers of users of its 2FA app Authy; last week, hackers claimed to have stolen 33M phone numbers from Twilio (Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai/TechCrunch)
Amazon plans to discontinue Astro for Business, its robot security guard for SMBs announced in November 2023, on September 25 to focus on its Astro home robot (Todd Bishop/GeekWire)

A look at enterprise browser startups like Island and Here, which aim to provide built-in browser security controls and better app integrations needed for work (Isabelle Bousquette/Wall Street Journal)
Sources: Harvey, which builds generative AI tools for law firms, now expects to raise ~$100M at a $1.5B valuation after reported talks to raise $600M at $2B+ (The Information)
Q&A with Adam Mosseri on Threads' first year, not leaning into political content, driving engagement, focusing on real-time content, the fediverse, and more (Casey Newton/Platformer)
